JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: Dishwashers to Aamanns 1921 and Aamanns Replik
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Dishwashers to Aamanns 1921 and Aamanns Replik

 

About the job

Aamanns 1921 and Aamanns Replik are our restaurants placed in the center of Copenhagen.

 

To our well-engaged kitchen teams, we are now looking for dishwashers – one for each restaurant.

 

 

Come and join our team if:

  • you are a great colleague with a positive mindset and have some experience as a dishwasher or just fast at adapting to new tasks in a busy environment, we would love to hear from you.
  • you have an eye for keeping everything in order at the restaurant to operate
  • you are stable and flexible with the working hours
  • you are always keen on helping your colleague whenever requested
  • you know it will be a great day at work, if you bring your smile and a positive attitude
  • you speak English and maybe also a bit of Danish

 

At both Aamanns 1921 and Aamanns Replik, we offer you a team of colleagues, who are kind, very much engaged in quality and who love to have fun.

 

Additional information

Your working hours will be both during the day, evenings, and weekends.

 

At Aamanns 1921 we are open for lunch and evening seven days a week. 

 

At Aamanns Replik we are open for lunch Monday to Saturday from 11-15 and dinner from 17-20. Sundays we are only open for lunch from 11-17.

 

 

Salary will match your qualifications.

 

You can start with us right away. We will make sure you get the correct introduction to your tasks and the restaurant.

 

Please send us your CV to job@aamanns.dk and mark the email ‘Dishwasher to Aamanns’

We are looking forward to hearing from you.

 

About Aamanns

Aamanns is founded by Adam Aamann in 2006 with the opening of our first smørrebrød restaurant and take away at Østerbro in Copenhagen. Then and now our work is based on quality smørrebrød inspired by the traditional Danish cuisine but with a new interpretation.

 

Today Aamanns consists of different types of businesses who all work with the same gastronomic values and includes the high quality of smørrebrød into other interesting dishes.

 

Through the years our effort of revitalizing and reinventing smørrebrød has given us recognition from both our many guests who revisits us regularly and national and international food critics.

Aamanns Etablissement and Aamanns 1921 have been recommended several times in the Michelin Guide and in 2019 we won the award for ‘Best Smørrebrød of the year’ from Danske Madanmeldere.

 

Aamanns includes:

Aamanns Deli & Take Away (since 2006)

Aamanns Etablissement, our lunch restaurant (since 2009)

Aamanns CPH, restaurant at Copenhagen Airport (since 2015)

Aamanns lunch catering (since 2015)

Aamanns Køkken & Event, venue og cantine at Refshaleøen (since 2015)

Aamanns 1921, restaurant (since 2017)

Aamanns Replik at Skuespilhuset (2021)

Aamanns Carlsberg Byen (opening Summer 2022)

Aamanns Botanical Senses (soaps and lotions)

Aamanns Schnapps (our series of schnapps in cooperation with Braunstein)

Aamanns cookbooks

 

Sustainability with focus on organic produce and animal welfare

Sustainability, animal welfare and organic produce play a key role across our businesses. In 2019 three of our units achived Det Økologiske Spisemærke in silver, meaning that 60-90 % of our produce in the kitchen is organic. We constantly work on sustainable solutions – e.g., food waste, separation of waste and packaging. Aamanns is also a part of” Bæredygtig Bundlinje” in cooperation with The City of Copenhagen, Danish Industry and Gate21 DI.

 

Read more about Aamanns (only in Danish). You can also find us on Facebook, Instagram and LinkedIn.
